title: Detailers Larry Kosilla, Jason Rose, Kevin Brown
description: This week we round up the 3 finest detailers in North America to hone the finish on.... a Fox Body Notchback with incredibly shitty paint.  We brought nuclear warheads to a knife fight, but sometimes that's just how we do things.  Jason Rose (Meguiars), Kevin Brown (Buff Daddy.com) and of course our very own Larry Kosilla (AMMO NYC) dive deep into the world of detailing.  This episode represents a commitment to cleaning and presentation that would make your mother proud.  Although we still discourage sharing these shows with your mom. All that plus the detail masters answer listener questions.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
